attributes.action: Sign the petition to keep Britain in the E.U. Don't trigger article 50.
attributes.additional_details: The country Voted for Brexit. But we also want to know what Brexit means.
attributes.background:
Triggering article 50 without knowing the terms of Brexit is unfair. 
We have been deceived and lied to once before. 
The decision to leave must go before Parliament. 
An unelected Prime Minister wants to make a momentous decision without the consent of the people she represents.
